items.name: Name
items.description: Such as first or last name.

items.name: Email Address
items.description: Including but not limited to a hashed email address.

items.name: Phone Number
items.description: Including but not limited to a hashed phone number.

items.name: Physical Address
items.description: Such as a home address, physical address, or mailing address

items.name: Other User Contact Info
items.description: Any other information that can be used to contact you outside the app.

items.name: Health
items.description: Health and medical data, including but not limited to information from the Clinical Health Records API, HealthKit API, and Movement Disorder API, or from health-related human subject research or any other health or medical data that you provide.

items.name: Fitness
items.description: Fitness and exercise data.

items.name: Payment Info
items.description: Such as form of payment, payment card number, or bank account number. If an app uses a payment service and the payment information is entered outside the app, the information will not appear in this section.

items.name: Credit Info
items.description: Such as credit score

items.name: Other Financial Info
items.description: Such as salary, income, assets, debts, or any other financial information.

items.name: Precise Location
items.description: Information that describes your location with the same or greater resolution as a latitude and longitude with three or more decimal places.

items.name: Coarse Location
items.description: Information that describes your location with lower resolution than a latitude and longitude with three or more decimal places, such as from Approximate Location Services.

items.name: Sensitive Info
items.description: Such as racial or ethnic data, sexual orientation, pregnancy or childbirth information, disability, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade union membership, political opinion, genetic information, or biometric data.

items.name: Contacts
items.description: Such as a list of contacts, address book, or social graph.

items.name: Emails or Text Messages
items.description: Including subject line, sender, recipients, and contents of the email or message.

items.name: Photos or Videos
items.description: Your photos or videos.

items.name: Audio Data
items.description: Your voice or sound recordings.

items.name: Gameplay Content
items.description: Such as content you generate in-game.

items.name: Customer Support
items.description: Data you generate during a customer support request.

items.name: Other User Content
items.description: Any other content you generate.

items.name: Browsing History
items.description: Information about the content you have viewed that is not part of the app, such as websites.

items.name: Search History
items.description: Information about searches performed in the app.

items.name: User ID
items.description: Such as screen name, handle, account ID, assigned user ID, customer number, probabilistic identifier, or other user- or account-level ID that can be used to identify you or your account.

items.name: Device ID
items.description: Such as the device’s advertising identifier or other device-level ID.

items.name: Purchase History
items.description: Your purchases or purchase tendencies.

items.name: Product Interaction
items.description: Such as app launches, taps, clicks, scrolling information, music-listening data, video views, saved place in a game, video, or song, or other information about how you interact with the app.

items.name: Advertising Data
items.description: Such as information about the advertisements you have viewed.

items.name: Other Usage Data
items.description: Any other data about your activity in the app.

items.name: Crash Data
items.description: Such as crash logs.

items.name: Performance Data
items.description: Such as launch time, hang rate, or energy use.

items.name: Other Diagnostic Data
items.description: Any other data collected for the purposes of measuring technical diagnostics related to the app.

items.name: Environment Scanning
items.description: Such as mesh, planes, scene classification, and/or image detection of the user’s surroundings.

items.name: Hands
items.description: The user’s hand structure and hand movements.

items.name: Head
items.description: The user’s head movement.

items.name: Other Data Types
items.description: Any other data types not mentioned.
